entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:59 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 5:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 53 %
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: W 39 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
